banner.title: Greetings, my name is Mahay.
banner.description: A Frontend Developer specialized in web development, committed to crafting compelling user interfaces and experiences for websites and web applications, thereby contributing to the overall success of the products.

aboutTitle.title: About me
aboutTitle.desc: In this section, I share my passion for front-end development, where each project is an opportunity to create interfaces that are both visually appealing and high-performing. With deep expertise in modern tools and technologies, I am committed to delivering top-quality front-end solutions. Discover how my dedication to innovation and attention to detail translates into exceptional user experiences.

aboutProjects.title: Projects
aboutProjects.desc: In this section, explore a selection of my professional and personal achievements to gain a concrete insight into my expertise.

1.title: First IMMO
1.desc: The First IMMO website, focused on real estate in Madagascar, is developed using WordPress with HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JavaScript, Gulp,and incorporates the Google Maps API. It offers a user-friendly interface and a wide range of services for property rental and acquisition.

2.title: SANKO
2.desc: The landing page for SANKO, a brokerage and organizational consulting company based in Madagascar and active across Africa, was developed using WordPress, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, and JavaScript

3.title: TOA
3.desc: TOA is a leader in the telecommunications tower infrastructure market. For the technology side, we utilized HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavScript, Gulp, and Elementor on WordPress.

4.title: Mind money
4.desc: Mind Money is a personal project, a web application designed to track, analyze, and optimize expenses. Users need to create an account and log in to access the application. The project was developed using Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, TypeScript, and Firebase.

5.title: Taskmanager
5.desc: Taskmanager is a personal project, a web application for managing daily tasks. It features a calendar view for tasks and includes a login section to access the application. The project was developed using React.js, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, Typescript and Firebase.

6.title: Greengascar
6.desc: GreenGascar is Madagascar's first carbon footprint calculator. It helps users measure and reduce their environmental impact by analyzing energy consumption, transportation, and waste. The site was developed with React JS, HTML5, CSS3, Typescript and Wordpress.

7.title: Travelian
7.desc: Travelian is a personal project, a landing page focused on the travel theme. The goal is to demonstrate that it is entirely possible to create a landing page using Next.js. The project was developed with Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS and TypeScript.

8.title: Snake 2D
8.desc: Snake 2D is a game developed using React.js, showcasing the potential of creating interactive games with this framework. The game is built with HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, TypeScript, and utilizes the canvas element for rendering graphics. This project demonstrates how modern web technologies can be leveraged to create engaging and dynamic gaming experiences.

9.title: Simply Sweet
9.desc: Simply Sweet is a web application developed in React JS, designed to simplify the management of children's product sales. It enables tracking of sold and unsold items, displaying key performance indicators (KPIs), and filtering data by month and year. The technologies used include HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, TypeScript, and Firebase for data management and authentication.
